hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Boing-oing!^There are times in life when one should seek the help of others...^Thus, when standing alone fails to help, stand together.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Small Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #0# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that Stalchildren leave you alone when wearing the Bunny Hood?

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is the #Market Bazaar#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #time#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Gerudo Training Ground# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #village well# leads to the #Carpenters' tent#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Alcove Above Stairs

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #0# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #0# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path of #the hero#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Lobby Basement Lower
